name: Pancake Flipper
description:
Ever wondered what it would feel like to play while holding your controller upside down? Well now you can try it in:


A short experimental game about working at a pancake stall for minimum wage.

Made over the course of two days in an effort to get projects done and create some weird experimental things. You can see the devlog with my thought process and results on my twitter!
https://twitter.com/TheFieryChocobo/status/1590361587365576704
